ttp_template:
<group name="vrf">
PIM Neighbor Table for {{VRF | ORPHRASE}} VRF
<group name="expires_interface_mode">
{{NEIGHBOR}} {{INTERFACE}} {{UPTIME | ORPHRASE}} {{EXPIRES}} {{MODE}} {{TRANSPORT | ORPHRASE}}
</group>
</group>
cli_content:
PIM Neighbor Table for default VRF
Neighbor Address  Interface             Uptime    Expires   Mode    Transport
192.0.2.2         Ethernet20/1          02:26:03  00:00:16  sparse  datagram
192.0.2.4         Port-Channel1.10      02:25:25  00:01:25  sparse  datagram
192.0.2.6         Vlan100               02:04:47  00:01:32  sparse  datagram
192.0.2.8         Vlan200               02:04:47  00:01:35  sparse  datagram
textfsm_template:
Value Filldown VRF (\S+)
Value Required NEIGHBOR (\d+\.\d+\.\d+\.\d+)
Value INTERFACE ([\w\./-]+)
Value UPTIME (\S+)
Value EXPIRES (\S+)
Value MODE (\S+)
Value TRANSPORT (\S+)

Start
  ^\s*PIM Neighbor Table for ${VRF} VRF\s*$$
  ^\s*Neighbor Address\s+Interface\s+Uptime\s+Expires\s+Mode\s+Transport\s*$$
  ^\s*${NEIGHBOR}\s+${INTERFACE}\s+${UPTIME}\s+${EXPIRES}\s+${MODE}\s+${TRANSPORT}\s*$$ -> Record
  ^%\s
  ^. -> Error

EOF
